description:
Working as a full stack developer, using .NET Core (6+) on the backend in a microservices architecture and Angular (12+) on the frontend. We use PubNub for real-time communication between applications and AWS for databases, lambdas, gateways, etc. Applications are Dockerized and orchestrated with Kubernetes, with CI/CD on GitLab. Our applications have unit tests and integration tests to ensure stability despite changes.

We use SCRUM and follow a 2-week sprint, completing all rituals. The client I work with is from the United States, so I use English for daily text/voice communication.
title: Fullstack Developer

description: Brief stint with an international client, where I worked with a team based in Brazil and India to create microservices for an existing application. The microservices were being developed using .NET 6 and Kafka for inventory control.
title: Senior Systems Analyst

description: Remotely allocated at Banco Safra, I worked on various projects, including Open Banking, credit operations, and other internal projects. The projects I worked on used .NET Core 3.1 and NodeJS to build APIs, new background processes with Hangfire, Kafka, etc.
title: Senior Developer Analyst

description: Development of an internal tool for people, business, and values using .NET Core (Windows Forms), Entity Framework Core, Dapper, and MySQL.
title: Mid-Level C# Developer

description: As a developer working with various clients and projects, I used various technologies and tools, such as .NET Core for projects with Razor, MVC, APIs, using Entity Framework Core, CQRS, SQL Server, among other things. On the frontend, I worked with Angular, Vue.JS, Stencil.JS, and other technologies.
title: Fullstack Developer

description: Development in .NET Framework, using ASP.NET WebForms, JQuery, and SQL Server. Creation of new screens and processes for insurance and capitalization systems.
title: Systems Trainee

description: As an intern, I was learning to develop new screens with Angular 2 and Ionic 2. On the backend, using mediator and CQRS, I created and updated new APIs using .NET Core, CQRS, and Entity Framework Core, along with Azure SQL Server as the database. The application I worked on used Azure for deployment, with a strategy where the Angular application was statically deployed on the same backend service.
title: Programming Intern
